title: Reached season goal of Gold
body:
went on a 9 game win streak and finally made it to Gold.  I wasn't  sure if I could do it,  but I focused  on improving every game; it payed off.  

Feels good :)  Shoutout to whatsmystat and ChrisLuong.

replies.body: Grats man. My goal was plat. Got to gold III 70ish LP, then I dropped to gold V 75 LP. Then I was like... "Nah. Next season."

Good job :D

Rock those season rewards out, you deserve them
Congrats.  Meanwhile we're all still waiting on the announcement of the Halloween pumpkin carving winners.
I'm hoping for plat, but I think I need to improve if I want a chance.
